Name: Siphon Filter
Description: Increases All Damage dealt by an amount equal to an active HASTE bonus. Grants HASTE when within 15m of an entity suffering from SLOW.
Location: Can be found in the new dungeon "logistics bridge".;Too find this Ring, you need to go the following path after unlocking the 3rd and last mini checkpoint. You should be standing over other 2 trains. There should be a hidden decoration pod standing around, shoot it, to unlock a pathway with the ring laying there. Use "fortune hunter"from the explorer class too see the location of the ring.
